descriptionHtml:
- Beautiful Aela 1.0 -

How to install:
1: Download the archive.
2: Unpack the archive and open the folder, see which paint/nopaint you like the most.
3: When you've found the paint you like, add the DATA folder in that map to archive (7zip or other)
4: Open the archive you made in the nexus mod manager and install it
5: Go to the store and buy a kitten. You will need a kitten for this mod to work properly.

( The default if downloaded with nmm is no facepaint )

A new look for Aela The Huntress with a few new paints to choose from.

- No face paint
- Default face paint
- Custom face paint I
- Custom face paint II
- Custom face paint III
__________________________________________________________________________

A younger more foxy looking Aela.

Please leave a comment and tell me what you think!
all response is welcome, negative or positive.

Note: Mods used in this NPC

Better females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 (None make-up version)

The Eyes Of Beauty: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722 (Highly recommended)

BFG - Better face gen: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
__________________________________________________________________________

If you have any problems please contact me :)
author: Jonay
